message.content:
cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.GR, cs.MM

This paper deals with the task of artistic text style transfer, which involves generating stylized text from a source image. This task involves computer vision (CV) techniques such as image processing and style transfer, which suggests that cs.CV is the most likely sub-category. The paper also proposes a novel bidirectional shape matching framework and a scale-controllable module, which involve machine learning (ML) techniques such as GANs and neural networks, suggesting that cs.AI and cs.LG are also likely sub-categories. The paper also deals with graphics (GR) techniques such as typography and glyph deformation, suggesting that cs.GR is a likely sub-category. Finally, the paper involves multimedia (MM) techniques such as image and text processing, suggesting that cs.MM is also a likely sub-category.
